[le_liv_regional_employ](https://github.com/OHI-Baltic/bhi-prep/blob/master/layers/le_liv_regional_employ_bhi2019.csv)\

*Goal Targets: LIV*\
<br>

Employment percentages derived from NUTS2 regions employment data from Eurostat, and using populations by NUTS2 regions to downscale then aggregate employment rates to BHI regions. Data source: [Eurostat database lfst_r_lfe2emprt](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/products-datasets/-/lfst_r_lfe2emprt)\
